comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of March 29, 1914 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=940CE2DB153FE233A... shows the same (or a very similar) photo. '"GRAVE Situation in Ulster," "Mutiny of Army Officers," "King Intervenes," "Civil War Threatened." These are typical of the sensational headlines which have appeared in the press during the last few days concerning Ireland. '
